name: 星球管理公司PMC
description:
A VR based three elimination+text game, in which you will play the role of an employee of a planet management company, responsible for collecting energy and advancing planet evolution.
————————————————————————————————
Collect Energy:
Use the tools in your hand to harvest energy in a dedicated "mine" area – immersive match-3 in four directions in a VR device
Advancing Planetary Evolution:
Using the collected energy, the "office" is used to evolve and upgrade equipment - based on a word game, receive information from the planet, and different choices will correspond to different benefits and affect the information received in the next period
————————————————————————————————
Planet Management Company is recruiting employees!
Here, you will deeply participate in the company's project operations and become a unique planet manager!
[Qualification]
1. No age limit, no experience limit. If you dare to come, we dare to take it
2. Owning a VR device
3. Participate in at least two hours of work (don't ask why)
[Job Benefits]
1. Get a brand new work experience and control the fate of the entire planet (at least it looks like this)
2. Independent large studio, individually allocated workspace, friendly to social anxiety individuals
3. You only need to pay a certain cost of labor before joining to have a complete set of work equipment after joining the company
Salary and benefits
1. Salary Uh Face to face discussion?
2. You can bring your own fruit, but be careful not to damage the VR device (we do not guarantee this)
